p: Although blood tests and image inspections of patients with liver diseases reveal normal ranges, oxidative damage is frequently observed in the liver. For example, serum AST or ALT levels were normal or slightly elevated in obese fatty liver patients. However, there was a definite change in the oxidative stress markers of hepatic tissue [ 44]. Hence, the antioxidant effects of C. longa can play a crucial role in the management of hepatobiliary diseases because oxidative stress is closely associated with hepatic steatosis, inflammation process, cirrhosis, and tumorigenesis.
